meanings.definition: To make a loud sucking noise while eating or drinking.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to slurp its milk in the most obnoxious way possible.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner seemed to slurp up all the dirt from the carpet.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's slurping sounds echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A loud sucking noise made while eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: The slurp from the straw was loud.
meanings.sent2: I heard a slurp coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The slurp of the spaghetti noodles hitting the plate was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The slurp of the drain as the water went down was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The slurp of the baby drinking from the bottle was adorable.
